nav.div: Detroit Edison Public School Academy » COVID-19

div.div:
During this time of school closure, we would like to share useful support information to students and their families as we all make adjustments during this time of crisis with the COVID-19. Below, we have compiled a list of resources for low-cost internet services (provided via Comcast and AT&T), CDC information updates from federal and state government, and other relevant information to keep our students and families safe as we navigate through the COVID-19 crisis.
- CDC - Coronavirus
- Michigan COVID-19 Updates
- Comcast Essentials Internet Service
- AT&T Access Program
- Coronavirus Grocery Shipping
1903 Wilkins St., Detroit, MI 48207 | Phone 313-833-1100 | Fax 313-833-8653
